meanings.definition: A large, blunt process on the femur of many vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The trochanter helps with muscle attachment.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the trochanter on the skeleton.
meanings.sent3: The trochanter decided to throw a party for the other bones.
meanings.sent4: The trochanter stood out like a mountain on the femur.
meanings.sent5: The trochanter, like a sturdy pillar, supported the leg structure.

meanings.definition: Any of several bony processes on the upper part of the femur of many vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The trochanter is a key feature in vertebrate anatomy.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian examined the trochanter carefully.
meanings.sent3: The trochanter challenged the other bones to a race.
meanings.sent4: The trochanter, like a crown, adorned the femur.
meanings.sent5: The trochanter, a prominent landmark on the femur, guided the muscles.
